Articles.Content:
we all know u will be back after a break

I'm not done yet, I still have the Legacy Command Pod to do. I'm just doing the interior now. I have a question though.

Would people prefer a set-up like the mk1-2 pod where there is two kerbals on top and one on the bottom, or one where they are all together in the middle? Or something else entirely?

Two at the top and one at the bottom I think since it looks like the mk 3 command pod

Edited September 21, 2014 by Teto

Please dont leave.

Your quality work is epic.

Please make all da ships!!!

PLS

I'm not done yet, I still have the Legacy Command Pod to do. I'm just doing the interior now. I have a question though.

Would people prefer a set-up like the mk1-2 pod where there is two kerbals on top and one on the bottom, or one where they are all together in the middle? Or something else entirely?

I think a two kerbal pod would be nice.

I think a two kerbal pod would be nice.

But then it can't hold the original three kerbals, like it originally did. Anyways, I've already finished modeling the interior. I'm just working on props now. I'll get a pic up tomorrow.
Here is what the internal looks like now. I still have a bit of texture work to do on the sides, and of course more props. It was partly inspired by the wonderful Gemini IVA in FASA.

I don't know if this has been asked before and I went back a few pages and didn't see it. Do you plan on doing the JJprise? To be honest, I am a pretty big star trek fan and I absolutely love the way the new Enterprise looks. I mean its a great combination of the original and new. I know a lot of Star Trek people don't like the new ship, but again personally I really do like it. To me its like Pizza and Ice Cream, they are both awesome but you can't compare them. Any way just wondering if you planned or considered doing the JJprise.

I hear that your leaving here, but are you going to do up a Defiant? I know I've asked about a Delta Flyer and it was turned down, but the Defiant was part of the poll listed above. The Defiant is one of my FAVORITE ships second to the Intrepid class Aka Voyager. I Do know your not into releasing unfinished or poorly done ships, But maybe a rushed version of the Defiant before you leave? I think you might be able to use an IVA from Voyager or even an enlarged shuttle IVA for it.
So I went to page 27 and saw your space dock if u have it still can u post a link to download it? I think it's amazing looking and just awsome.

I don't know if this has been asked before and I went back a few pages and didn't see it. Do you plan on doing the JJprise? To be honest, I am a pretty big star trek fan and I absolutely love the way the new Enterprise looks. I mean its a great combination of the original and new. I know a lot of Star Trek people don't like the new ship, but again personally I really do like it. To me its like Pizza and Ice Cream, they are both awesome but you can't compare them. Any way just wondering if you planned or considered doing the JJprise.

If you went back a couple pages you should know I'm not doing anymore ships.

I hear that your leaving here, but are you going to do up a Defiant? I know I've asked about a Delta Flyer and it was turned down, but the Defiant was part of the poll listed above. The Defiant is one of my FAVORITE ships second to the Intrepid class Aka Voyager. I Do know your not into releasing unfinished or poorly done ships, But maybe a rushed version of the Defiant before you leave? I think you might be able to use an IVA from Voyager or even an enlarged shuttle IVA for it.

You already answered the question yourself. I don't like releasing semi-finished products.

So I went to page 27 and saw your space dock if u have it still can u post a link to download it? I think it's amazing looking and just awsome.
All that was, was a model in blender. And I actually messed it up by rotating it in edit mode, so the mesh is basically useless now anyways.

The internal is really shaping up now. I just need to add some bits to make the bottom more interesting.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Ok. Command pod internal looks great!
Really excited to try out the legacy command pod! Thanks for all your awesome work!

If you went back a couple pages you should know I'm not doing anymore ships.

You already answered the question yourself. I don't like releasing semi-finished products.

All that was, was a model in blender. And I actually messed it up by rotating it in edit mode, so the mesh is basically useless now anyways.

The internal is really shaping up now. I just need to add some bits to make the bottom more interesting.

http://imgur.com/a/eFWY5

. .

Maybe you have noticed the incission in your chest.

While you where under the influene of our drugs, we implanted a device.

It will help you to understand, there are 5 lights!

I don't understand how you can be so mistaken.

Open your heart to the only truth!
That is looking great. Would fit nicely into the tech tree just prior to the Mk1-2 pod.
Im looking forward to the Mk 1 pod.

Any chance of a PLANET! SciFi thruster in the future? just an idea for madness

Edited October 3, 2014 by StarDrive85

Any chance of a PLANET! SciFi thruster in the future? just an idea for madness

And what planet would I make? None of the fictional planets are very interesting (In Star Trek at least).

The Legacy Command pod is up on Curse now, and I also uploaded v2.1 of the flag decals. I changed the shader that the flags used to what it should have been, so now it's the same as the flags on the command pods.

You can get the mods here:

Command Pod

Flag Decals v2.1

Nice! One question I been wanting to get deadly rentry but how do you think that and you mods will work lol.

Well seeing as we now have the crimson pig fighter, we need guns..... Onwards to BDARMOURY!
Thanks for keeping the Legacy pack updated!
i really liked this mod.....
